replies.ride_ask_change: Sure, what can I change for you?
replies.ride_ask_booking_number: Can I get your booking ID, please?
replies.ask_name: Could you give me your name, please?
replies.ride_inform_changes_successful: Alright, thats all changes done for you!
replies.ride_inform_changes_failed: Unfortunately I wasn't able to update your booking, sorry.
replies.anything_else: Is there anything else that I can do for you?
replies.ride_inform_nothing_found: Unfortunately there are currently no rides available that match your search. Would you like to change any of your criteria?
replies.out_of_scope: I am sorry, I don't quite understand what you mean. I am only able to help you to change or cancel your ride.
